select fno, /*faq 순번*/ f_title as questions, /*faq 질문*/ f_content as asked, /*faq 답변*/ category /*faq 카테고리*/ from frequently where 1=1
and category = #{category} /*카테고리구분*/
order by fno desc
select ifnull(count(*), 0) as cnt from frequently where 1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into frequently ( f_title, /*faq 질문*/ f_content, /*faq 답변*/ f_create, /*faq 작성일*/ category, /*카테고리*/ fid /*작성자*/ ) values ( #{questions}, #{asked}, now(), #{category}, #{fid} )
mapper.update: update frequently set f_title = #{questions}, /*faq 질문*/ f_content = #{asked}, /*faq 답변*/ f_update = now(), /*faq 수정일*/ category = #{category} /*카테고리*/ where fno = #{fno}
